title: I Won't
subtle: Narrative (fiction), 78 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 240L
description: A little brother asks his sister to help him do some scary things. She doesn't want him to be scared. Will she help him or not? The book I Won't provides students with the opportunity to compare and contrast the characters. Students will love the detailed, supportive illustrations. Repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early readers.
reviewWords: book, mask, picture, scary, song, watch
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
grammar: Interrogative Sentences                : Recognize and use interrogative sentences
wordWork: Question Words                : Recognize and use question words
